channel.title: Need some help (first post)
channel.description:
hi ive recently started trying to make a runescape private server im 13 so im not too good at these things so ive got a couple of question if any1 could kindly help me...plz dont flame me for asking these
how can i make my client/server recognise dragon full helms and godsword? how/can you use a compiler on vista?
thanks to all who bother to answer this srry if this is a repost or something cus i couldnt find anything :D

item.title: Need some help (first post)
item.dc:creator: @zammykid1 zammykid1
item.description:
@zammykid1 wrote:

thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2009, 02:41:16 pm[/size][hr]can u help me with the vista compiler problem? it keeps saying depricated api recompile with -xlint any idea why?

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help (first post)
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

zammykid1:

sp3ke im on vista and no matter what i change the code to i get an error either depricated api or something about me not having jdk 5.0 or 6.0 (mod taharoks compiler)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2009, 01:45:28 pm[/size][hr]also to clear something up i already have those items gses and dfh in the game but when i try to buy 1 it says dark dagger or silverlight and for dfh it says item?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2009, 02:06:24 pm[/size][hr]can any1 offer anymore help?

Yeah it will only do that if you’ve not added the models, or you’ve got them but added them incorrectly. Just read some tutorials, theres alot around and there really easy to add. (Maybe not on these forums, but I’ve seen alot)

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help (first post)
item.dc:creator: @zammykid1 zammykid1
item.description:
@zammykid1 wrote:

sp3ke im on vista and no matter what i change the code to i get an error either depricated api or something about me not having jdk 5.0 or 6.0 (mod taharoks compiler)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2009, 01:45:28 pm[/size][hr]also to clear something up i already have those items gses and dfh in the game but when i try to buy 1 it says dark dagger or silverlight and for dfh it says item?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2009, 02:06:24 pm[/size][hr]can any1 offer anymore help?

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help (first post)
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

[quote=“W1ck3d, post:3, topic:299663”]Just Download the correct jdk and make your compiler recognize it.

For the first one, you need to add the godwars into client.java and item.cfg. and Dfh Item Id in item.java, item.cfg, and item4.java <-- may not need to, depends on the source[/quote]

If he dosen’t have the models of DFH’s and GS’s then it’s client-sided not server sided.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help (first post)
item.dc:creator: @W1ck3d W1ck3d
item.description:
@W1ck3d wrote:

Just Download the correct jdk and make your compiler recognize it.

For the first one, you need to add the godwars into client.java and item.cfg. and Dfh Item Id in item.java, item.cfg, and item4.java <-- may not need to, depends on the source

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help (first post)
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

To you’re first question “how can i make my client/server recognise dragon full helms and godsword?” you will need to add the models and ints of the item(s) you want to add.

To you’re second question, I have no clue what you mean. I’m using vista, and works perfectly.

Read full topic
